desc: A family-run livestock farm situated in the beautiful Low Weald of Sussex selling Pasture for Life certified beef. We breed and rear pedigree Aberdeen Angus, Beef Shorthorn and White Park cattle.

layout.text:
Reared with respect, in harmony with nature
